review_title: Job position at DIEESE, union company
job_title: Technician II in São Paulo, São Paulo
pros: Nice ideological company, with good working relations
cons: May work overtime, there is no bonus and sometime 13rd salary may delay.

job_title: Economist in Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais
pros:
Flexible and motivating environment
Collaborative, friendly and easygoing staff
Above the average salary for economists and sociologists
Well located offices
cons:
Lacks more organized management and human resources
Doesn’t have a good career path, it’s hard to get promotions and go up
